THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
08.01.2019, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING:

Bee
2019/KER/783
Cr1.MC.No. 154 of 2019
2
ORDER

The prayer in this Crl.M.C. is to issue a direction to
the investigating officer to complete the investigation
and file the final report in C.R.No.15 of 2018 of
Udumbanchola Excise Range, within a time frame.

2. Heard.

3. The learned Public Prosecutor has submitted
that the above crime was registered only on
19.04.2018 and hence, atleast a period of three months
is required for completing the investigation. In view of
the above submission, no direction is required at
present in this Crl.M.C.

Dene)
ene
Boe
2019/KER/783
Cr1.MC.No. 154 of 2019
3
In the result, this Crl.M.C. stands closed.
However, this order will not stand in the way of
the petitioner in approaching this Court again after a
period of three months, if the situation so warrants.
Sd/-
B.SUDHEENDRA KUMAR
RK/09.01.2018 JUDGE
